comments: Unlimited idea to idea local/STD mobile calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable -- 50 MB 2G/3G/4G data (4G handset users will get additional 250 MB 2G/3G/4G data) --
Unlimited Local Calls with FUP, 50 MB 2G/3G data (4G handset users will get additional 250 MB 2G/3G data^)
